shader_model.longdesc:
Repeats a shape x Iterations times, and for each iteration uses the transformation in 3D Transformation Node.

3D transformation node uses the generic V4->V4 Type

There are 3 modes available:
 - Fold
     Transforms space x Iterations times.
     The object SDF3D is evaluated only once after the last iteration.
     Using operators like Axis Symmetry is possible to repeat space.
 - Min
     Transforms space x Iterations times.
     The object SDF3D is evaluated for each iteration,
     and combined with the previous result using the min operation.
 - Custom
     Transforms space x Iterations times.
     The object SDF3D is evaluated for each iteration,
     and combined with the previous result using the custom SDF2D operation.

Code - PauloFalcao
shader_model.name: MFSDF Fractal IFS

parameters.label: Mode
parameters.longdesc:
Iteration combine mode.
 - Fold
     Transforms space x Iterations times.
     The object SDF3D is evaluated only once after the last iteration.
     Using operators like Axis Symmetry is possible to repeat space.
 - Min
     Transforms space x Iterations times.
     The object SDF3D is evaluated for each iteration,
     and combined with the previous result using the min operation.
 - Custom
     Transforms space x Iterations times.
     The object SDF3D is evaluated for each iteration,
     and combined with the previous result using the custom SDF2D operation.
parameters.name: mode

parameters.label: Correction
parameters.longdesc:
Only used for Mode Custom.
Keep this value as low as possible!
Increase this correction value if the resulting SDF is not perfect.
A higher value will increase ray marching loop iterations and will result in higher render times.
parameters.name: Correction

shader_model.longdesc:
Modifies an SDF by comparing the base SDF and a modified blured version of the base SDF.
Object colors are modified based on the difference of the two SDFs, with a texture for surface where the two SDFs are equal, a texture for holes where the difference is negative, and a texture for bumps where the difference is positive.

shader_model.longdesc:
Modifies an SDF by comparing the base SDF and a modified version of the base SDF.
Typically the modified version is a soft version of the base version, which can be done using the Node SDF Blur
Object colors are modified based on the difference of the two SDFs, with a texture for surface where the two SDFs are equal, a texture for holes where the difference is negative, and a texture for bumps where the difference is positive.

Code - PauloFalcao
shader_model.name: SDF Deform Edges Generic

parameters.label: Select
parameters.name: m
parameters.shortdesc: SDF Selection between the base SDF (value 0) and the modified SDF (value 1)

(opcional) The combine operation, defined as a SDF2D.
Will be applied after each SDF3D evaluation to combine with the previous result.
inputs.name: custombool

shader_model.longdesc:
IFS Fractal, repeats a shape x Iterations times, and for each iteration uses the transformation in 3D Transformation Node.

3D transformation node uses the generic V4->V4 Type

There are 3 modes available:
 - Fold
     Transforms space x Iterations times.
     The object SDF3D is evaluated only once after the last iteration.
     Using operators like Axis Symmetry is possible to repeat space.
 - Min
     Transforms space x Iterations times.
     The object SDF3D is evaluated for each iteration,
     and combined with the previous result using the min operation.
 - Custom
     Transforms space x Iterations times.
     The object SDF3D is evaluated for each iteration,
     and combined with the previous result using the custom SDF2D operation.

Code - PauloFalcao
shader_model.name: SDF Fractal IFS

parameters.label: Mode
parameters.longdesc:
Iteration combine mode.
 - Fold
     Transforms space x Iterations times.
     The object SDF3D is evaluated only once after the last iteration.
     Using operators like Axis Symmetry is possible to repeat space.
 - Min
     Transforms space x Iterations times.
     The object SDF3D is evaluated for each iteration,
     and combined with the previous result using the min operation.
 - Custom
     Transforms space x Iterations times.
     The object SDF3D is evaluated for each iteration,
     and combined with the previous result using the custom SDF2D operation.
parameters.name: mode

shader_model.longdesc:
Creates a TEX3D by comparing the base SDF and a modified version of the base SDF.
Typically the modified version is a soft version of the base version, which can be done using the Node SDF Blur
Object colors are modified based on the difference of the two SDFs, with a texture for surface where the two SDFs are equal, a texture for holes where the difference is negative, and a texture for bumps where the difference is positive.

Code - PauloFalcao

parameters.label: Roundness
parameters.longdesc:
This is a correction to the smoothness.

0 (default) - With correction, this way a flat object will no smoothess will be flat, the correction is not perfect with few repetions it's still possible to notice some distortion. 

1 - Without correction, using this setting a flat object will be rounded, even with smoothness at zero.

inputs.label: Image
inputs.longdesc: The image that will be repeated
inputs.name: img

inputs.label: 2D Transformation
inputs.longdesc: The transformation that will be applied each iteration, only transformations nodes can be used, like translate, scale, etc
inputs.name: trans2d

shader_model.longdesc:
Repeats a shape x Iterations times, and for each iteration uses the transformation in 2D Transformation Node.

2D Transformation nodes should start with the Image "Axis" node, operations should not use buffer, only coordinates transformations should be used, nodes that transform colors here will transform space.

There are 3 modes available:
 - Average
     Transforms space each iteration.
     The input image is evaluated for each iteration, and at the end the average of all evaluations is returned.
     Using operators like Mirror is possible to repeat space.
 - Blend
     Transforms space each iteration.
     The input image is evaluated for each iteration.
     Each iteration the previous image is combined with the current only using the specified blending mode.
     Using operators like Mirror is possible to repeat space.
 - Fold
     Transforms space each iteration.
     The input image is evaluated only at the end.
     Using operators like Mirror is possible to repeat space.

Code - PauloFalcao, RodZilla  (Bending modes)
